description: OSR power - configures ADC to have an oversampling ratio of 2^OSR_POWER
Total number of clock cycles for the sample-and-hold circuit
Number of clock cycles that the sample-and-hold circuit will actually be enabled, to allow non-overlapping clocks
Number of clock cycles that the bottom sampling capacitor plates will be connected to the sample net
Number of clock cycles that the SAR logic will take for each segment, both positive and negative phases (so the whole SAR logic will take 8 * N_SAR_CYCLES)
Total number of clock cycles that the INT1 state will take
Total number of clock cycles in which the INT1 state will be active
Total number of clock cycles that the INT2 state will take
Total number of clock cycles in which the INT2 state will be active
When a 1 is written, begins the ADC conversion
Stored read data for CLKGEN xip
When a 1 is written, reads the data in the CLKGEN IP at the address specified by CLKGEN_DRP_DADDR and stores in the {CLKGEN_DRP_DO1, CLKGEN_DRP_DO0} registers
When a 1 is written, writes the data in {DRP_DI1, DRP_DI0} to the address of the CLKGEN xip specified by CLKGEN_DRP_DADDR
